des: "We all love this sauce on most anything, but especially on chicken and ribs. Use on chicken, pork, beef, hamburgers, meatballs, egg rolls, etc."
ins: Combine brown sugar, chile sauce, grape jelly, mustard, vinegar, soy sauce, honey, salt, and chipotle powder in a saucepan over medium-low heat. Cook, whisking well until brown sugar and jelly are dissolved, about 5 minutes. Bring just to a boil; remove from heat. Add cornstarch; whisk sauce until smooth and thickened.
